modName: Caught Red Handed - Marry Haelga or Svana
summary: An option to complete the quest for Haelga and marry her afterwards. Or help Svana and win her affection!
descriptionHtml:
Ever wanted to marry Haelga, the ultimate lover of Skyrim? Or her poor niece? Now you can!

This mod allows you to complete the quest differently and tell Haelga what Svana's plotting against her, after which she will be more than grateful and willing to marry you. Her niece, on the other hand, will not take kindly to that outcome...

However, should you choose to finish the quest for Svana - you will be able to marry her.

Version 1.1
-If the quest is finished for Svana she won't say "[i]Sure, leave. Not like you care anyway[/i]." anymore. [Requested]
author: Vorrr
